  • {@systemProperty sun.net.httpserver.timerMillis} (default: 1 sec)
    - * The granularity of the timer that manages request and response times. + * {@link java.io.IOException}. This timer has an implementation specific granularity + * that may mean responses are aborted later than the specified interval.
